name: StellarWi-Fi
0:
”Alexa, turn off the kitchen”
”Alexa, dim the bedroom by 20 percent”
”Alexa, set the living room to 30 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill helps you to control your Stellar devices by using VOICE commands.

You can change your Stellar lights' color, brightness and shades of white by using this skill.

To get started, enable this skill and follow the instructions:
* Open your Stellar app (You can get Stellar app from www.sansistellar.com or any other trusted ways). Login with your Stellar account. At the sidebar, select "Associated Amazon" and login with your Amazon account to get your account linked.
* Follow the instructions in the Stellar app to set your Stellar devices connected to your Wi-Fi and name them with readable words.
* Let Alexa get your Stellar devices by saying "Alexa, discover devices" to your Alexa device.
After a successful discovery, you can then control the device with your voice.

When using this skill, you need to specify which device to use. You can use the names of devices which are shown and can be changed in the Stellar app, or you can use Alexa groups to control multiple devices. See more information about Alexa group at http://amzn.to/2rxCQTH.

After setting is finished, you can use commands to control your Stellar devices.
You can learn more about command formats at http://amzn.to/2qpSKAm.

Notes:
* Controls of brightness and color are available for RGB bulbs.
* Controls of brightness and shades of white are available for CCT bulbs.
* Contact us at service@sansitech.us if you have any problems or suggestions.
